```{r}
library(ahead)
library(forecast)
```


```{r}
x <- fdeaths 
xreg <- ahead::createtrendseason(x)
(z <- ahead::ridge2f(x, xreg = xreg, h=20))
autoplot(z)
```

```{r}
x <- USAccDeaths
xreg <- ahead::createtrendseason(x)
(z <- ahead::ridge2f(x, xreg = xreg, h=20))

```
